name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Frontend Engineer with extensive experience in using **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **React**, **React Query**, **React Router**, and **MaterialUI** to create user-centric, responsive applications. Proven ability to integrate with backend technologies such as **Django REST Framework** and databases like **PostgreSQL**. Adept at leveraging cloud services including **AWS** and container orchestration tools like **Kubernetes** and **Docker** for scalable solutions. Strong expertise in performance monitoring and optimization tools such as **Datadog**, **New Relic**, **Sentry**, and **LogRocket**. Recognized for implementing CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, and **ArgoCD**. With a solid foundation in **Redis**, **Celery**, **Pandas**, and **Numpy**, I am committed to delivering high-quality code while continuously enhancing application performance and user experience. Passionate about driving innovation across industries, including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, while adhering to best practices in software development.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed rich web applications using **React**, **TypeScript**, and **MaterialUI**, improving user engagement by 50% through dynamic and responsive interfaces.
Created efficient state management systems utilizing **React Query** and **Redux**, which reduced data fetching times by 30%.
Implemented routing architectures with **React Router**, ensuring seamless navigation and enhancing user experience.
Integrated backend services using **Django REST Framework** and **PostgreSQL**, achieving a 40% improvement in data retrieval efficiency.
Collaborated with backend teams to deploy microservices on **AWS** and **Kubernetes**, maintaining a system uptime of **99.9%**.
Containerized frontend applications with **Docker**, streamlining deployment processes and ensuring consistency across environments.
Automated builds and tests using **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, decreasing integration times by **75%** and improving overall code quality.
Utilized monitoring tools such as **Datadog** and **New Relic** to assess application performance, optimizing loading speeds by **25%**.

Developed user interfaces using **React** and **TypeScript**, enhancing user experience through intuitive design and reducing load times by 30%.
Implemented state management with **React Query**, improving data fetching efficiency by 40%.
Collaborated with backend teams to integrate RESTful services using **Django REST Framework**, ensuring seamless data flow and reducing error rates by 15%.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** for database management and optimization, achieving a 20% improvement in query performance.
Managed deployment processes using **AWS**, ensuring high availability and scalability of applications.
Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, promoting a reliable deployment process with a 95% success rate.
Employed container orchestration with **Kubernetes** and **Docker**, improving deployment speeds by 50%.
Monitored application performance through **Datadog** and **New Relic**, enhancing system reliability and user satisfaction rates.
Developed real-time logging and monitoring systems using **Elasticsearch** and **Sentry**, achieving an incident response time reduction of 60%.

Designed and developed dynamic web applications using **TypeScript** and **JavaScript**, enhancing user experience and performance metrics.
Implemented frontend solutions with **React**, optimizing component load times by **40%** through effective state management and route optimization using **React Router** and **React Query**.
Utilized **MaterialUI** for UI components, ensuring a responsive design that increased user engagement by **25%**.
Collaborated on backend integration with **Django REST Framework** and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring high availability and data integrity with **98%** uptime.
Managed application deployment on **AWS**, orchestrating containers with **Kubernetes** and **Docker** to ensure scalability and maintainability.
Monitored application performance using **Datadog** and **New Relic**, leading to a **30%** reduction in load times and improved error tracking through **Sentry** and **LogRocket**.

skills:
Programming Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	Backend Frameworks: Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, Django REST Framework, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	Frontend Frameworks: React, React Query, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	API Technologies: RESTful API design

	Serverless and Cloud Functions: AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway

	Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, MongoDB

	DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, ArgoCD

	Cloud & Infrastructure: AWS, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack, Elasticsearch, Sentry, LogRocket, Datadog, New Relic

	Other: Microservices, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies
